channel.title: Unamed pvp 317 best old school server, new year suprise :o
channel.description:
REASON I RELEASING THIS: I QUITED RSPS, I DONT PLAY ANYTHING ANYMORE
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2e6bgh0.png[/img] This Server: this Server is old school , i coded it with my friend, we coded it b4 2 years or 1 and half or even 3 years idk..never rememberd....
Details: Server Was Very Loved, alot of players, secure server.
Was 4th on runelocus with 5400+ votes, alot of people told me to release before but i didn't want.......
This Server Is mainly Pk Server.......PERFECT COMBAT. -RANGE FOLLOWING -MAGE FOLLOWING -MELEE FOLLOWING ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Server Can't Be crashed....or you can't spam ...u need to w8 3 seconds between each talking :)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NO LUNAR , or 525 cache or over perfect perfect perfect old 317!!!!
Ancient Works 100% with all Spells .
Modern Magic Also Works. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- RANDOM DROPS DISABLED if you want it on PM ME ill show you how... -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
PK POINTS, FUN, NICE AWESOME REWARDS...AND ALSO ((ANTI LAG)) SERVER...
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Dragon Claws Is Still inside the server, i know that will make it an old school....but u can remove it in 1 minute :P --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Perfect NPC COMBAT not lagging or shit, perfect Pking ...
(people used to come to this server because its for pking.) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- PK SERVER ,with training 3k per hit.... ofc master for admins and mods... Easy to get cash...................... ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- PVP MODE SWITCHER , THNX SO MUCH TO WHO CREATED CRAZY PVP 100% credits of this to him ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Alot Of shops , barrows shop , mage shop ,pk shop , range shop ,pure shop
3 training areas (low, med , high) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- PK point SHOP......................:):):):) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SO MUCH STUFF...........................
There is also pvp wars only happens at the end of weeks, u choose between 2 capes and they teleport u, and w8 for all, and team wins get cash....and stuff
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- FEW PICTURES................... PLEASE NO FLAMING OR ANYTHING PLEASE ....
PVP POINTS: [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2vltjdy.png[/img]
Perfect combat: [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/6eenur.png[/img]
hahah i still remember this pic... i owned him at last.. [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/nladjr.png[/img]
other pk pic: [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2i1gjsn.png[/img]
see hows its awesome(pvp drops): [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/208ip8p.png[/img]
ANOTHER Pk pic... [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2pyyvf6.png[/img]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- OK i almost forgot which is the important thing the Link for server................
SERVERLINK:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?4ud8ca9wj85dam3]UNAMEDPVPOLD.rar[/url] SERVERLINK:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?4ud8ca9wj85dam3]UNAMEDPVPOLD.rar[/url] SERVERLINK:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?4ud8ca9wj85dam3]UNAMEDPVPOLD.rar[/url] SERVERLINK:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?4ud8ca9wj85dam3]UNAMEDPVPOLD.rar[/url] SERVERLINK:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?4ud8ca9wj85dam3]UNAMEDPVPOLD.rar[/url]
CLIENT: JUST USE ANY (NON BLUUR) Client..................., you can even use mopar but gs's and dclaws wont show , thnx see you guys
Pvppker

@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Kaex, post:6, topic:376140”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=472073.msg3452411#msg3452411 date=1293844568]
If it was old school then it wouldn’t of had the Godswords and stuff, other than that, I suppose this isn’t too bad.
[/quote]

Your correct on the “and stuff” but godswords, they came out in 474. Still the low detail graphics, aka still old school. Real technical old school is 300-340. But yer, godswords are still oldschool. lol.[/quote]
Old school to me is with the maximum of whips. Though, it doesn’t matter to be honest.
